vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.6;
son of: Ashhur (H0806) and Naarah (H5292B);
brother of: Ahuzzam (H0275), Hepher (H2660) and Haahashtari (H0326);
half-brother of: Zereth (H6889), Izhar (H3328), Ethnan (H0869) and Koz (H6976)
§ Temeni = "southern"
a Judaite, son of Ashur by one of his two wives Naarah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Ashur; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
提米尼 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "南方的"
猶大人亞施戶和其雙妻之一的拿拉所生的兒子 (代上4:6)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
提米尼 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "南方的"
犹大人亚施户和其双妻之一的拿拉所生的儿子 (代上4:6)
